title: Documentation for torchvision.RandomAffine() refers to a wrong URL
body_html:
The doc for the resample option in torchvision.RandomAffine() refers to Pillow docs version 3.4.x but this link gives Permission Denied. However, the links for version 5.2.0 and the stable version work, so I think it will be good to update the link.

Documentation Page for torchvision.RandomAffine():
https://pytorch.org/docs/stable/torchvision/transforms.html#torchvision.transforms.RandomAffine

Current URL (not working/permission denied):
http://pillow.readthedocs.io/en/3.4.x/handbook/concepts.html#filters

Working URL (5.2.0):
http://pillow.readthedocs.io/en/5.2.x/handbook/concepts.html#filters

Working URL (stable):
http://pillow.readthedocs.io/en/stable/handbook/concepts.html#filters

body:
The doc for the **resample** option in `torchvision.RandomAffine()` refers to Pillow docs version 3.4.x but this link gives **Permission Denied**. However, the links for version 5.2.0 and the stable version work, so I think it will be good to update the link.

Documentation Page for `torchvision.RandomAffine()`: 
https://pytorch.org/docs/stable/torchvision/transforms.html#torchvision.transforms.RandomAffine

Current URL (not working/permission denied):
http://pillow.readthedocs.io/en/3.4.x/handbook/concepts.html#filters

Working URL (5.2.0):
http://pillow.readthedocs.io/en/5.2.x/handbook/concepts.html#filters

**Working URL (stable):**
http://pillow.readthedocs.io/en/stable/handbook/concepts.html#filters
